1333: Finally back Christmastime The nerves are so beautiful blank Whether it rains or snows We meet on Glühweinstand We forget our neighbor not buy all the stores empty The whole city is sinking tonight in Lichtermeer And you fly only 6 hours more doctors, pain without borders Little boys in Barcelona Shirts paint their dreams on the walls There is so much future, so much diversity in all the 54 countries, but only the same images, yellow protective suits to all the transmitters you walk through December ...

It's Christmas time, there's no need to be afraid
At christmas time, we let in light and we banish shade

But in our world of plenty, we should spread a smile of joy! 
Throw your arms around the world at christmas time
But say a prayer - pray for the other ones
At christmas time, it's hard but when your having fun
There's a world outside your window
And it's a world of dread and fear
Where the only water flowing is a bitter sting of tears
And the christmas bells that ring there are the clanging chimes of doom
...
